component.name: deleteObject
component.description: Removes the null version (if there is one) of an object and inserts a delete marker, which becomes the latest version of the object

component.name: deleteMultipleObjects
component.description: Delete multiple objects from a bucket using a single HTTP request

component.name: createObject
component.description: Upload an object to a bucket via an HTML form

component.name: getObjectMetaData
component.description: Retrieves metadata from an object without returning the object itself

component.name: createObjectACL
component.description: Set the access control list (ACL) permissions for an object that already exists in a bucket

component.name: createObjectCopy
component.description: Creates a copy of an object that is already stored in Amazon S3

component.name: initMultipartUpload
component.description: Initiate a multipart upload for Part uploads

component.name: abortMultipartUpload
component.description: Abort a currently active multipart upload

component.name: uploadPart
component.description: Upload a part for a current multipart upload

component.name: completeMultipartUpload
component.description: Complete a currently active multipart upload

component.name: getAuthorization
component.description: Get Authorization details for the requests
